text:
While everyone eagerly awaits Hailey Baldwin and Justin Bieber's impending wedding, Baldwin is lying low in Los Angeles. Heading to a hair appointment, she wore the ultimate L.A. girl transitional look: a fall-ready chunky cardigan with can't-give-them-up-yet denim short shorts.

The combo may be harder to pull off in chillier climates, but there's no denying Baldwin made a simple white tank top look cool with the addition of a trio of pieces: an oversize sweater, denim shorts, and combat boots. Are you taking notes yet? Plus, the chunky sweater is a universal trend that every New Yorker also owns in multiple variations, so it's a foolproof investment this season. Scroll down to see Baldwin's new look and shop it for yourself.
title: How Hailey Baldwin Makes a Basic White Tank Look Cool
